name: Musical Madness (Kenny Diedrich)
description:
GMTK 2020 Submission: Musical Madness

"Wrangle these brats into order in time for the big music recital!"

You're a music director at your wit's end. The chorus concert is in a few minutes, and these kids aren't even in their places! Seat the rowdy children according to the organizational notes you wrote before time runs out!

Attributions:

  • [SFX] Crowd chatter: http://soundbible.com/2163-Party-Crowd.html
  • [BGM] Children singing: https://www.looperman.com/loops/detail/219663/school-choir-122-122bpm-trap-choir...
  • [BGM] The Show Must Be Go by Kevin MacLeod
    Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4509-the-show-must-be-go
    License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
  • [BGM] Five Card Shuffle by Kevin MacLeod
    Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3763-five-card-shuffle
    License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
  • [FONT] Chalk font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Kalam#standard-styles
  • [SCRIPT] Sprite outlines: https://nielson.dev/2016/04/2d-sprite-outlines-in-unity
